content: Butter Chicken Ball, anyone? 🍗🍚 Introducing the ultimate comfort food that's gonna make your taste buds go wild! Tender chicken balls smothered in rich butter sauce, served over fluffy rice and spiced with Indian flavors. So good, you'll be like "Butter, YASSSS!" Limited time offer, use code BUTTERBALL10 for 10% off. Order now and treat yourself! #ButterChicken #Yum
